summary: Sent on a secret mission, a ronin must discover who his friends are and who must die.
cast: Toshirô Mifune|Yûjirô Ishihara|Ruriko Asaoka|Shintarô Katsu|Kinnosuke Nakamura|Chûsha Ichikawa|Ichirô Arishima|Mika Kitagawa|Yoshio Tsuchiya|Jôtarô Togami|Chieko Nakakita|Ryûnosuke Yamazaki|Seishirô Kuno|Yasuo Araki|Hiroshi Tanaka|Hirohito Kimura|Yutaka Sada|Shinsuke Achiwa|Yuzuro Sawanobori|Shunichi Okita|Kazuo Suzuki|Koji Kaminishi|Yasuji Uraki|Kenzô Echigo|Minoru Itô|Yukihiko Gondô|Kôji Kakigi|Isamu Arai|Kazutoshi Yoshiyama|Toshio Endô|Shigeyoshi Yokota|Mitsuyuki Oshima|Kimizuka Masazumi|Kengo Nakayama|Yoshiharu Takahashi
title: Machibuse
